pullRequest.title: Update CD workflow to publish artifacts to maven central
pullRequest.bodyText:
Upload to Maven Central as part of CD pipeline.
Alternative approach to #464 by adding the sensitive data to github secrets
SONATYPE_USER (nexus username),
SONATYPE_PASSWORD (nexus password),
PGP_PRIVATE_KEY (private key for signing)
PGP_PASSPHRASE (passphrase)

nodes.bodyText: I think clean target is not necessary as it is already part of the Build step.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    cat <(echo -e "${{ secrets.PGP_PRIVATE_KEY }}") | gpg --batch --import
          
          
            
                   gpg --batch --import --no-tty <(echo -e "${{ secrets.PGP_PRIVATE_KEY }}")
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -53,6 +56,14 @@ jobs:
         aws s3 cp artifacts/*.rpm $s3_path/rpms/opendistro-security/
         aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id ${{ secrets.DISTRIBUTION_ID }} --paths '/downloads/*'
 
+    - name: Upload Artifacts to Maven Central
+      env:
+        SONATYPE_USER: ${{ secrets.SONATYPE_USER }}
+        SONATYPE_PASSWORD: ${{ secrets.SONATYPE_PASSWORD }}
+      run: |
+        cat <(echo -e "${{ secrets.PGP_PRIVATE_KEY }}") | gpg --batch --import

commit.message: Deploy to Maven Central in CD workflow
